nodes.text: Governor Dannal was the Imperial official in charge of the planet Gerrard V in 0 BBY. Following an uprising by local rebels that required the intervention of the Imperial Navy, Governor Dannal and Senator Chelo were ordered to report to Emperor Palpatine to explain their failure to prevent rebellion on the planet.

Dannal was first mentioned in the 1994 Galaxywide NewsNets section of Star Wars Adventure Journal 3. The 1998 video game Star Wars: Rogue Squadron features a separate separate uprising. No source has linked Dannal to the governor of the other uprising.
